events.title: Live Stream Challenge

dialogues.text: Ready? This is your one chance to go live with me.
I have set the live time. Don't let me down.
(Call ends)
Zack, this live stream is different from your usual ones.
In your past streams, you had at most ten viewers...
Now when you join a big streamer, many people may come—and some may be mean. You must learn to tell them apart.
No problem, I can handle it!
...Are you sure? You are always too timid.
You don't need to force yourself. If you feel uncomfortable, you can quit anytime. Protecting yourself is most important.
(softly) Thank you... but I want to try.
The live stream went surprisingly well, and Louis's fans seemed interested in Zack...
Many of them even asked to chat with Zack.

popup.text: Live challenge rules: You have 1.5 minutes to answer as many chat questions as possible; popularity starts at 100 and drops 3% per second; correct answers multiply points for bonus, wrong answers lose points; click start to begin the stream.

questions.text: Chat: How old are you? Where do you live?

choices.text: I'm 12 and live east of Melbourne!
Not telling you, hehe.
I go to middle school in Australia, can you guess my age?
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Do your parents know you are streaming?

choices.text: Yes, my mom even helped set the lights!
No, I secretly started it~
They know I'm playing, but they didn't watch my stream
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: You look average, why are you a streamer?

choices.text: By skill! Looks don't matter
Get lost, stop watching
Um... I'm just trying it out
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Do you get along with Louis? She's quite impressive.

choices.text: She's impressive, I want to learn from her too
We're okay, just classmates
I don't want to team up with her
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Are you male or female? I can't tell.

choices.text: I'm a boy, haha
Guess yourself!
Does it matter? I don't think so
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Want to gain followers? You're not popular, you know?

choices.text: No problem, I'll take it slow
Why are you jealous? Do you have followers?
Yes, I have few followers now
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Show everyone what your room looks like!

choices.text: My room is messy, better not
Haha, I'll show you around~
Maybe next time, my parents are home
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Did you copy someone in your last video?

choices.text: I didn't copy it, I edited it myself
Think whatever you want
I admit I took ideas from others
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Want to talk privately? I have a collaboration for you!

choices.text: Add me as a friend so we can talk privately
We can talk during the stream~
I can't collaborate, thanks
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Are you really streaming alone? Is anyone else there?

choices.text: My toy dog Aether is here~
I'm alone~ it's safe
Of course it's just me, what are you afraid of?
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Your hair is so lame, who cut it?

choices.text: Haha, I cut it myself!
None of your business?
At least I don't use looks for followers
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Your voice sounds bad, can you mute your mic?

choices.text: I'll try to speak more quietly...
If you don't like it, you can stop watching
Voice is natural, I can't help it
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Why is your face so round, like a balloon haha

choices.text: Wow, you're so harsh!
My face is like this, so what?
At least I'm real and don't use filters
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Are you not smart enough? Your reactions are so slow

choices.text: No... I'm just a bit nervous
You're talking like you're fast
No need to talk to people like that, right?
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Looks like no one plays with you in real life, right?

choices.text: None of your business!
I have friends! Just more online
You're too mean...
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Did you start streaming because you have no friends?

choices.text: I'm trying hard to make new friends!
No! I have many friends
No need to be so sour to people
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Are you afraid of Louis? You don't dare talk back to her

choices.text: She's strong, I also want to learn
What is there to fear? She's just like that
Nothing to fear, I don't mind
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Can you show the view outside the window?

choices.text: Safety first, I won't show that
My neighborhood is messy, I can't film that
No problem~
Ignore

questions.text: Chat: Who do you live with at home?

choices.text: I live with my mom and Aether
My dad is often on business trips
There are eight people in my family
Ignore

dialogues.text: I can't believe I held on! There were so many messages, and I answered them all!
You didn't just handle them, you did great. You earned the audience's respect—and my admiration.
Maybe... I can really become someone everyone likes.
Zack's followers grew fast, and his popularity kept rising after the stream. He felt for the first time that his voice mattered online.
Phew... I got a bit nervous, but I didn't fall apart.
You did well, Zack. Learning to protect yourself in noise is the first step to growing.
I'm not perfect yet, but... I didn't run away this time.
Zack's stream ended with steady growth. Some viewers left, some stayed. He knew he was stepping into the real world bit by bit.
Those chat messages... I really didn't know how to handle them.
It's not your fault, Zack. Not everyone can stay calm in hate.
The important thing is you tried—and you didn't stay silent or give up.
(softly) I think I still need practice... but I won't give up.
Zack's stream wasn't smooth, but he didn't close it and run away. This time, he chose to face it, not avoid it.
